    • Uses of ClientController in suncertify.client

      Subclasses of ClientController in suncertify.client 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LocalClientController
      The LocalClientController class is a controller type that uses a local BrokerServer for database operations.
      class  RemoteClientController
      The RemoteClientController class is a controller type that uses a remote BrokerServer for database operations.
